channel.title: Action Timer
channel.description:
Can someone help me?
I'm trying to make it once somebody clicks on a lever, or stands in a certain spot, it puts like a 20-second timer on their screen(like the system update one - or it can be in the chatbox) and then teleports them to specific coords.
Can this be done?

item.title: Action Timer
item.description:
@11131 wrote:

just a second i can say the action timer but yeah… just a minute ill edit this topic when i have the thing.

ok…

For action timer its

actionTimer = 25;

For the tele its abit simple ^^
teleportToX = XXXX;
teleportToY = YYYY;

Back up your client just in case you muck up, if you don’t know what to do send me the code you’re going to use and ill patch 1 up for you

oh wait actiontimer is differnt, nvm >.<

My only choise if i was you is search through your whole client in-game and check if theres a delay before teleing then find it on the client.java

Read full topic
